mapper.insert: INSERT INTO site_community_party ( post_id, game_mode, is_open_top, is_open_jungle, is_open_mid, is_open_ad, is_open_sup, post_status, is_use_mic ) VALUES ( #{postId}, #{gameMode}, #{isOpenTop}, #{isOpenJungle}, #{isOpenMid}, #{isOpenAd}, #{isOpenSup}, #{postStatus}, #{isUseMic} );
mapper.select: SELECT post_id, scpp.top_puuid, scpp.jungle_puuid, scpp.mid_puuid, scpp.ad_puuid, scpp.sup_puuid FROM site_community_party_participant scpp WHERE post_id = #{postId} FOR UPDATE

SELECT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM site_community_party_participant WHERE post_id = #{postId}
and top_puuid is not null
and jungle_puuid is not null
and mid_puuid is not null
and ad_puuid is not null
and sup_puuid is not null
)

WITH seq AS ( INSERT INTO sequence_party_applicant(post_id, current_seq) VALUES (#{postId}, 1) ON CONFLICT (post_id) DO UPDATE SET current_seq = sequence_party_applicant.current_seq + 1 RETURNING current_seq ) SELECT current_seq FROM seq
SELECT post_id, applicant_puuid, position, is_approve, reg_dt, upd_dt, applicant_seq FROM site_community_party_applicant WHERE applicant_seq = #{applicantSeq} AND post_id = #{postId}

SELECT post_id, applicant_puuid, position, is_approve, reg_dt, upd_dt, applicant_seq FROM site_community_party_applicant WHERE applicant_puuid = #{puuid} AND post_id IN
#{postId}

select scp.post_id, scp.community_code , scp.title , scp."content" , scp.reg_dt , scp.upd_dt , scp.writer_site_code , scp.writer_puuid, scd.game_mode , scd.is_open_top, scd.is_open_jungle, scd.is_open_mid, scd.is_open_ad, scd.is_open_sup, scd.post_status, scd.is_use_mic, scpp.top_puuid, scpp.jungle_puuid, scpp.mid_puuid, scpp.ad_puuid, scpp.sup_puuid from site_community_post scp inner join site_community_party scd on (scp.post_id = scd.post_id) inner join site_community_party_participant scpp on (scp.post_id = scpp.post_id) where scp.del_dt is null and scp.writer_puuid = #{puuid} and scd.post_status = 'OPEN'
SELECT post_id, applicant_puuid, position, is_approve, reg_dt, upd_dt, applicant_seq FROM site_community_party_applicant WHERE post_id = #{postId} and is_approve is null and del_dt is null
mapper.update: UPDATE site_community_party SET post_status = #{postStatus}, upd_dt = current_timestamp WHERE post_id = #{postId}
mapper.select: SELECT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM site_community_post scp inner join site_community_party scp2 on (scp.post_id = scp2.post_id) WHERE scp.writer_puuid = #{puuid} and scp.del_dt is null and scp2.del_dt is null and scp2.post_status = 'OPEN' )
